Title: Requires state agencies to make available all public documents in a digital format on their website
Summary: Requires state agencies to make available all public documents in a digital format on their website in a manner that allows such documents to be printed; provides that no document required by law to remain confidential shall be deemed a public document.
LawSection: New York State Printing and Public Documents Law
LawCode: Amd ยง12, NYS Print L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York state printing and public documents law, in relation to requiring state agencies to make available all public documents in a digital format on their website
